sources.title: Allotment Wives (1945) Kay Francis, Paul Kelly, Otto Kruger
sources.description: Allotment Wives is a 1945 American FILM NOlR directed by William Nigh and starring Kay Francis, Paul Kelly and Otto Kruger. Its plot is about an army investigator who tries to shut down a scam that preys on soldiers, and unknowingly falls in love with the woman behind it. You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .
